====================
Sale Stock Auto Move
====================

This module extends the functionality of sale module
and allow you to auto-deliver the sale order

Usage
=====

The sale workflow does not expect to use auto_move option for its deliveries.
So the ship_end signal is triggered before the ship state and the ordr will never
be in done state.


.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/stock-logistics-workflow/8.0

.. repo_id is available in https://github.com/OCA/maintainer-tools/blob/master/tools/repos_with_ids.txt
.. branch is "8.0" for example

Known issues / Roadmap
======================

* ...

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues
<https://github.com/OCA/stock-logistics-workflow/issues>`_. In case of trouble, please
check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first,
help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
